projects.title: AI-Powered Job Application Assistant
projects.description: Full-stack job application system with AI-powered resume tailoring using Next.js, FastAPI, and Claude/OpenAI
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive AI-powered job application assistant that automatically scrapes job listings, enriches them with company data, and uses LLMs to intelligently tailor resumes while maintaining authenticity. Features multi-source job scraping, company enrichment via Proxycurl, LangChain-powered resume customization, and automated PDF generation using JSON Resume standard.
projects.contribution: Architected three-tier system, implemented LLM integration with validation layers, built job scraping pipeline, created CLI tools with Rich library, designed PostgreSQL schema with JSONB support, integrated multiple APIs (JobSpy, Proxycurl, Claude, OpenAI)

projects.title: AI-Powered Hiring Orchestrator
projects.description: Multi-agent AI system for fair, evidence-based candidate evaluation using LangGraph and specialized AI agents
projects.longDescription: Built an agentic hiring orchestrator using LangGraph to coordinate three specialized AI agents (HR, Technical, Compliance) that evaluate candidates in parallel. Implemented a two-pass evaluation pattern to reduce hallucinations by 85%, structured Pydantic validation for type-safe state management, and evidence-based scoring with full audit trails. System generates role-specific rubrics, detects agent disagreements, and produces targeted interview plans.
projects.contribution: Designed multi-agent workflow architecture with LangGraph, implemented two-pass evaluation pattern to reduce LLM hallucinations, built parallel agent coordination with reducers, created structured Pydantic models for type-safe state transitions, developed disagreement detection algorithm, integrated multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, llama.cpp), built FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

impact.efficiency: 85% time reduction in evaluation (5-8 min vs 45-60 min)
impact.auditability: Full audit trail with evidence citations
